title: AWS API Gateway IAM authorization and AWS v4 request signing
description: Creates an API with AWS_IAM authorizer, accessible via AWS APIGW with AWSv4 signing for public API.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern illustrates the process of signing the HTTP request using IAM credentials and adhering to the AWS v4 signing method. This ensures access to the protected endpoint from a public API. The interaction with APIs is facilitated by AWS API Gateway. For more details refer to this pattern's documentation.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
